trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Baltimore

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and a friend were baking in my kitchen when we saw flashes in the sky from the kitchen window, facing my backyard. We ran out onto my deck and recorded what we saw on my cell phone. Sadly, my cell doesn't have a HDR video recorder so what I caught was one of the dots doesn't quite do it justice. I suppose It's better than nothing. The dots would spark up then vanish, they looked as if they were moving on the same parallel rail, back and forth. It went on for about 10 minutes but it was hard to catch them on film because they would fade in and out so fast. I have a full 5 minute version which you can hardly see anything, but, about a minute in you can see one we were able to catch on camera. I took the liberty of clipping the footage of just the UFO in case you didn't want to hear me and my friend banter about aliens for 5 minutes
Summary: moving dots witnessed in MD sky daytime with video
